Emerging Growth Company&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&nbsp;13(a) of the Exchange Act.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9744; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Item&nbsp;1.01 Entry into a Material Definitive Agreement On April&nbsp;9, 2018, Broadcom Inc., a Delaware corporation (the &#147; Company &#148;), became a guarantor of the Notes (as defined below) and entered into supplemental indentures with the Issuers and the Trustee (each as defined below), dated as of April&nbsp;9, 2018 (the &#147; Supplemental Indentures &#148;), to (a)&nbsp;that certain Indenture dated as of January&nbsp;19, 2017 (as amended or supplemented as of the date hereof, the &#147; January 2017 Indenture &#148;), among Broadcom Corporation, a Delaware corporation, as issuer (&#147; Broadcom Corporation &#148;), Broadcom Cayman Finance Limited, an exempted company incorporated with limited liability in the Cayman Islands, as co-issuer (&#147; Cayman Finance &#148; and, together with Broadcom Corporation, the &#147; Issuers &#148;), Broadcom Limited, a public company limited by shares incorporated under the laws of the Republic of Singapore (&#147; Broadcom Limited &#148;), as a guarantor, Broadcom Cayman L.P., an exempted limited partnership registered under the laws of the Cayman Islands, acting through the Company, its general partner, as a guarantor (&#147; Broadcom Cayman LP &#148;), and Wilmington Trust, National Association, as trustee (the &#147; Trustee &#148;), in respect of the Issuers&#146; 2.375% Senior Notes due 2020, the Issuers&#146; 3.000% Senior Notes due 2022, the Issuers&#146; 3.625% Senior Notes due 2024 and the Issuers&#146; 3.875% Senior Notes due 2027 (collectively, the &#147; January 2017 Notes &#148;) and (b)&nbsp;that certain Indenture, dated as of October&nbsp;17, 2017 (as amended or supplemented as of the date hereof, the &#147; October 2017 Indenture &#148; and, together with the January 2017 Indenture, the &#147; Indentures &#148; and each an &#147; Indenture &#148;), among the Issuers, Broadcom Limited, Broadcom Cayman LP and the Trustee in respect of the Issuers&#146; 2.200% Senior Notes due 2021, the Issuers&#146; 2.650% Senior Notes due 2023, the Issuers&#146; 3.125% Senior Notes due 2025 and the Issuers&#146; 3.500% Senior Notes due 2028 (collectively, the &#147; October 2017 Notes &#148; and, together with the January 2017 Notes, the &#147; Notes &#148;). In addition, Broadcom Cayman LP was released from its guarantee of the Notes under each of the Indentures in accordance with their terms. The foregoing is only a brief description of the Supplemental Indentures and is qualified in its entirety by reference to the Supplemental Indentures, copies of which is filed as Exhibits 4.1 and 4.2 and are incorporated herein by reference. Item&nbsp;9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits. (d) Exhibits &nbsp; Exhibit Number &nbsp;&nbsp; Exhibit Description 4.1 &nbsp;&nbsp; Supplemental Indenture to the January 2017 Indenture, dated as of April&nbsp;9, 2018. 4.2 &nbsp;&nbsp; Supplemental Indenture to the October 2017 Indenture, dated as of April&nbsp;9, 2018. SIGNATURE Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned hereunto duly authorized. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Broadcom Inc. Date: April&nbsp;9, 2018 &nbsp; &nbsp; By:&nbsp; &nbsp; /s/ Thomas H. Krause, Jr. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Thomas H. Krause, Jr. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Chief Financial Officer
